item.title: Markdown Cheatsheet
item.description: MarkDown CheatSheet Heading H1 H2 H3 # H1 ## H2 ### H3 Bold Bold **bold text** Italic Italic *italicaized text* Orderted List First item Second item Third item 1. First item 2. Second item 3. Third item Unordered List First item Second item Third item - First item - Second item - Third item Code public static void main(String[] args) { } Horizaontal Rule --- Image ![i m a image](/blog/wallpaper.jpg) Table A B C aaa bbb ccc aaa bbb ccc | A | B | C | | ------ | ------ | ------ | | aaa | bbb | ccc | | aaa | bbb | ccc | Footnote Here.
